about_the_game:
The mysterious mansion you've visited is full of perplexing traps and strange monsters!

[Play Together (2-player)]
Work together to complete a total of 20 unique co-op games!

Minigames:
- Haunted Escape
Proceed to the goal without falling with the crumbling floor.

- Shadow Puzzle
Control the spikes and move the blocks around.

- Darkness Dodge
Move around and dodge the falling pieces of furniture.

- Ghost Hunt
Find the hidden ghosts by shining your light on them.

- Haunted Boat
Collect souls as you proceed to the goal.

- Shadow Swing
Make your way to the goal by traveling on top of the pendulums.

- Undead Cart
Work together and guide your pushcart to the goal zone.

- Monster Art
Look at the pictures on the left and right and search for mistakes.

- Haunted Mirror
Memorize the mirror ghost's dance and replicate it.

- Dark Shift
Move the blocks and make your way to the door.

- Ghostly Cleaning
Work together to clean up all the mess.

- Undead Defense
Work together to defend the zone and keep the monsters out.

- Phantom Memory
Open the coffins and match the ghosts that are alike.

- Light Up the Shadows
Light up all the lanterns to make the area bright.

- Ghost Attack
Work together as a piggyback team and reach the goal.

- Phantom Treasure
Carry the treasure chest to the goal.

- Shadow Cart
Carve a path by knocking out monsters and make your way to the goal.

- Phantom Buster
Knock out the monsters as they advance.

- Monster Tower
Pile up the objects to reach the target height.

- Ghost Cooking
Prepare food and deliver it to the one who ordered it.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7750 (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
